contents.text: Thank you for calling Airware, the world’s number one enterprise drone analytics company based in San Francisco.
For information about our drone analytics solutions, press 1.
To speak with our sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need pricing details and integration options for your enterprise drone analytics platform.
Talk to a sales rep about purchasing a drone analytics package for my security consulting business.
Request a detailed quote for the enterprise drone telemetry analytics platform, including API integration specs and licensing tiers
I’d like to speak with someone about pricing and contract details for your drone analytics service.
Inquire about student or academic pricing for using your drone analytics platform in my physics research.

contents.text: To schedule a live product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a demo specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a live demonstration of your drone analytics system for our team.
Schedule a live demo of the drone analytics platform for search-and-rescue operations.
Schedule a deep-dive demo of the real-time flight analytics dashboard and anomaly-detection features
I need to arrange a live demonstration of your drone analytics platform.
Set up a live demonstration of your drone analytics solution for evaluation in my research work.

contents.text: For customer support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and software assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Our drone analytics software is failing to upload data—please connect me with tech support to resolve it.
Get technical support to resolve software integration issues with my mapping tools.
Troubleshoot Python SDK integration with your drone data ingestion API and resolve authentication errors
I require help troubleshooting my drone analytics software.
Get technical support to fix an error I encounter when uploading flight data to the analytics software.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need to review and pay our latest invoice and update our billing information.
Discuss a billing discrepancy on my account after upgrading my service plan.
Review and adjust my enterprise subscription plan, plus reconcile last month’s pro-rata billing statements
I have questions about my bill and need assistance with my account payment.
Request an itemized invoice and explain recent charges on my analytics subscription.
